Caron Butler

Pronunciation: \cuh-RON\

James Caron Butler

(Tuff Juice)

Position: Small Forward and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-7, 228lb (201cm, 103kg)

Born: March 13, 1980 in Racine, Wisconsin us

College: UConn

High Schools: Washington Park in Racine, Wisconsin, Maine Central Institute in Pittsfield, Maine

Recruiting Rank: 1999 (60), 2000 (47)

Draft: Miami Heat, 1st round (10th pick, 10th overall), 2002 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: October 30, 2002

Career Length: 14 years

  • 2x All Star
  • 2011 NBA Champ
  • 2002-03 All-Rookie

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Caron Butler?

Caron Butler is 45 years old.

Where was Caron Butler born?

Caron Butler was born in Racine, Wisconsin.

When was Caron Butler born?

Caron Butler was born on March 13, 1980.

How tall is Caron Butler?

Caron Butler is 6-7 (201 cm) tall.

How much did Caron Butler weigh when playing?

Caron Butler weighed 228 lbs (103 kg) when playing.

Is Caron Butler in the Hall of Fame?

Caron Butler is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Caron Butler drafted?

Caron Butler was drafted by Miami Heat, 1st round (10th pick, 10th overall), 2002 NBA Draft.

What position did Caron Butler play?

Small Forward and Shooting Guard.

When did Caron Butler retire?

Caron Butler last played in 2016.

What is Caron Butler's net worth?

Caron Butler made at least $84,676,523 playing professional basketball.

How much did Caron Butler make?

Caron Butler made $10,561,960 in 2011.

What did Caron Butler average?

Caron Butler averaged 14.1 points, 5.0 rebounds, and 2.3 assists per game.

How many rings does Caron Butler have?

Caron Butler won one championship.

What schools did Caron Butler attend?

Caron Butler attended Washington Park in Racine, Wisconsin, Maine Central Institute in Pittsfield, Maine and UConn.

What are Caron Butler's nicknames?

Tuff Juice is a nickname for Caron Butler.
